name: Juan L. Reutter
content: Juan Reutter Juan L. Reutter Assistant Profesor Departamento de Ciencia de la Computación Escuela de Ingeniería, PUC Chile. j r e u t t e r [at] ing . puc . cl Home Projects Publications Talks Teaching Contact Other I'm an associate professor in the department of computer science of Pontificia Universidad CatÃ³lica de Chile, and an associate researcher in the Millenium Institute for Foundational Research on Data. I received my PhD in the University of Edinburgh on 2013. My research interest has to do with mathematical foundations of data management, web data and data science. I received the Cor Baayen Young Researcher Award from the European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics and a BCS distinguished dissertation award for my phD thesis. My research has also been highlighted with a Best Paper award at PODS 2011 and a Best Research Paper award at ISWC 2019. I am also part of the Steering Committee for the Alberto Mendelzon Workshop, if you have any ideas or wish to know how to get involved, drop me an email! Copyright (c) 2007 Juan Reutter.
